meanings.definition: A chromosome that is not a sex chromosome
meanings.sent1: An autosome carries genetic information but is not involved in determining sex.
meanings.sent2: During cell division, autosome pairs separate to ensure each new cell has a complete set.
meanings.sent3: Why did the autosome feel left out? Because it wasn't a sex chromosome!
meanings.sent4: The autosome acted like a reliable messenger, delivering essential genetic instructions.
meanings.sent5: The autosome, like a diligent worker, diligently carries out its genetic duties.

meanings.definition: Any chromosome other than a sex chromosome
meanings.sent1: In humans, each cell contains 22 pairs of autosomes and one pair of sex chromosomes.
meanings.sent2: The autosome plays a crucial role in passing on genetic traits from parents to offspring.
meanings.sent3: The autosome decided to throw a party for all the other chromosomes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as an autosome's ability to pass on genetic information.
meanings.sent5: The autosome stood out among the chromosomes, quietly carrying the genetic code of life.
